message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $10,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to offer $9,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is a fair price considering the value this product brings.  Could you meet me halfway at $9,500?
Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm willing to pay $9,200 for the product.
